analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/15/0x5e5e8d48b42686de57a1448ea02db5e40fc0f732.sol#307-308) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/15/0x5e5e8d48b42686de57a1448ea02db5e40fc0f732.sol#485-503)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/15/0x5e5e8d48b42686de57a1448ea02db5e40fc0f732.sol#588-597)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/15/0x5e5e8d48b42686de57a1448ea02db5e40fc0f732.sol#654-661) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/15/0x5e5e8d48b42686de57a1448ea02db5e40fc0f732.sol#429-445):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/15/0x5e5e8d48b42686de57a1448ea02db5e40fc0f732.sol#441)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/15/0x5e5e8d48b42686de57a1448ea02db5e40fc0f732.sol#443)

	External calls:

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/15/0x5e5e8d48b42686de57a1448ea02db5e40fc0f732.sol#1127)
